name: Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot or environment is invalid -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends POST request to initiate a scan with chatbot "70ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b1c" and environment "aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f"
When the user receives the scan initiation response
Then the status code returned should be 404 for not found error
And the response should contain an error message "Not Found"

And the message should contain "Provided Chatbot 70ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b1c not found in Environment aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f.Both chatbot and environment should exist and chatbot should be assigned to the environment."

fullName: Initiate Scan using Genr3d API: Verify scan initiation fails when chatbot or environment is invalid
